abs.brief: calc abs value for each matrix element

[-1 1 100(         [A ARR_ACOS size=100 w=260 h=130 yr=0..3]

|

|

|

pddoc_args.info: float to add or matrix to add (Matrix NROWS NCOLS ...)
pddoc_args.name: v

all.brief: check if all elements of the matrix are non-zero

all_col.brief: row with each element (0 or 1) indicating whether the corresponding column has all non-zero elements

all_row.brief: column with each element (0 or 1) indicating whether the corresponding row has all non-zero elements

any.brief: check if any elements of the matrix are non-zero

any_col.brief: row with each element (0 or 1) indicating whether the corresponding column has any non-zero elements

any_row.brief: column with each element (0 or 1) indicating whether the corresponding row has any non-zero elements

clip.brief: clip matrix value to range [min, max]

col.brief: create Matrix column with specified values

conv2.example:
[T]
|
[metro 200]
|
[get list(
|
[ui.matrix @size=113x113 @cols=16 @rows=16 #d]
|
|
|
|
|                    [loadbang]
|                    |
|                    [16 16(
|                    |
[route list]         [matrix.randu]
|                    |
[msg 16 16]          [matrix.> 0.6]
|                    |
[matrix.new        #a]
|
[t a a]
|  ^|
|  [matrix.conv2 3 3 1 1 1 1 0 1 1 1 1]
|  |
|  [t a a         ]
|  |             ^|
|  [matrix.== 2] [matrix.== 3]
|  |.            |
[matrix.*]       |
|                |.
[matrix.+          ]
|              |
[matrix->list] [msg set #b]
|
[msg set list #c]

[X b->a]
[X c->d]

hist.brief: produce a matrix containing column histogram counts

insert_col.brief: insert vector at specified matrix column

insert_row.brief: insert vector at specified matrix row

pddoc_args.name: b

linspace.brief: generate row with linearly spaced N elements

logspace.brief: generate row with N elements spaced logarithmically

pddoc_args.name: N

mean_col.brief: mean value for each matrix column

doc_outlets.info: row vector with mean value for each column

return: row vector with mean value for each column

mean_row.brief: mean value for each matrix row

doc_outlets.info: column vector with mean value for each row

return: column vector with mean value for each row

median_col.brief: median matrix value for each column

median_row.brief: median matrix value for each row

doc_inlets.info: matrix to multiply element-wise: NROWS NCOLS ...

pddoc_args.info: matrix to multiply element-wise (Matrix NROWS NCOLS ...) or float to multiply all elements
pddoc_args.name: b

ncols.brief: return number of columns in Matrix

pddoc_args.info: float to compare or matrix to compare (Matrix NROWS NCOLS ...)
pddoc_args.name: v

nrows.brief: return number of rows in Matrix

ones_like.brief: create Matrix filled with ones with the same shape as input

randn.brief: generates Matrix using Gaussian distribution with zero mean and unit variance

range.brief: matrix range (difference between max and min)

range_col.brief: matrix column range (difference between max and min)

range_row.brief: matrix row range (difference between max and min)

replace.brief: replace specific elements with a new value

resize.brief: change size while keeping elements and preserving layout

row.brief: create Matrix row with specified values

shift_col.brief: shift Matrix elements by N positions in each column

shift_row.brief: shift Matrix elements by N positions in each row
